title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2665/98 of 10 December 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2782/76 laying down detailed implementing rules for the importation of preferential sugar
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2665/98 of 10 December 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2782/76 laying down detailed implementing rules for the importation of preferential sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 8 of Regulation (EEC) No 2782/76 is amended as follows:
1. the current text becomes paragraph 1;
2. the following paragraph 2 is added:
'2. Notwithstanding Article 45 of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3719/88 (*), quantities imported benefiting from the positive tolerance provided for in Article 8(4) of that Regulation shall qualify for the preferential arrangements provided they are covered by the certificate or declaration referred to in Articles 6 and 7 of the same Regulation.
(*) OJ L 331, 2.12.1988, p. 1.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to licences and certificates requested with effect from the entry into force of Regulation (EC) No 1033/98.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
